text: tavada (ovunva) anugamanaya kala movun “tavat vatavak apava (lovata) apasu yamata hæki vuvahot (apata maga penvu) ovun (dæn sampurnayenma) apava athæra dama æt vu akarayatama apit ovungen niyata vasayenma æt vannemu” yayi pavasannaha. (ovunge sarirayan vedana vindinneya). me akarayatama ovunge (hrdayanda vedana vinda) sokayata pat vima sandaha ovunge (napuru) kriyavan allah ovunta genahæra dakvanu æta. tavada ovun (nira) ginnen midennema næta
